action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spy makes three attacks, using Rapier or Hand Crossbow in any combination.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 9}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) Piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Poison damage.

action.name: Smoke Bomb (1/Day)
entries: The spy throws a bomb to a point it can see within 30 feet of itself. {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 20-foot-radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} centered on that point. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Poison damage, and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition until the end of the spy's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.
